block.p: A chart in Business Day on Friday showing the most recent expansion fees paid in four professional sports leagues misidentified the teams paying the most recent fees in Major League Baseball. They are the Arizona Diamondbacks and the Tampa Bay Devil Rays, not the Colorado Rockies and Florida Marlins. The Arizona and Tampa Bay teams, which will start playing in 1998, are both paying $130 million.
